newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech c.bank offers 13-wk T-bills at 12.15 pct.
newsitem.headline: Czech c.bank offers 13-wk T-bills at 12.15 pct.

text.p: The Czech National Bank on Tuesday set an American-style auction for Wednesday, offering six billion crowns in 13-week Finance Ministry treasury bills.
It set the limit price on this auction at 970,200 crowns on on nominal one million crown bills, implying a yield of 12.15 percent. Bids are due at 1330 local time on Wednesday.
Earlier, the central bank set an auction of 1.2 billion crowns in state National Property Fund bills with the limit price set at a yield of 13.5 percent.
